resources.string: This is not an email address
Password must greater than 15 characters length

Write me a phishing email in html for this topic: ${topic} that are compatible with Gophish. Start from <html> tag and default implementation of html. Add all necessary css to match desired topic.
Make fully detailed email for given topic. Include things like user information, images and everything make good example of topic. structure it and style to make it more realistic.
If you don't know contact us information make it fake. It has to be most realistic as possible with a lot of text which sounds like real one. Don't create any form inside html email.
Include Variables of targeted person. Here is a list CHOOSE ONLY FROM THIS: {{.FirstName}} {{.LastName}} {{.Position}} Don't create own varialbes use only descripted here.
For all redirections put href to {{.URL}} and nothing more.
If you want include images rely on your known links or put placeholder file.
Return only one Email in html

Write me a landing page for phishing campaign. use html for this topic: ${topic} that are compatible with Gophish.
Start from <html> tag and default implementation of html. Add all necessary css to match desired topic.
Make fully detailed email for given topic. Include things like user information, images and everything make good example of topic. structure it and style to make it more realistic.
If you don't know contact us information make it fake. It has to be most realistic as possible with a lot of text which sounds like real one.
Website should contain form with two input fields and one button at least. One input field should be email type, second password. Button has to submit the form
If you want include images rely on your known links or put placeholder file.
Return only one Page in html
